method.text: Put the turkey into a shallow dish. Blend the ingredients for the marinade together and pour over the turkey. Leave to marinate in a fridge for 1 hour.
Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan. Lift the chicken from the marinade, drain well, reserving the marinade.
Fry the turkey for 2-3 min. Add the mushrooms, pepper strips and sweetcorn. Fry for 5 min, or until the turkey is tender, stirring constantly.
Add the broccoli and cook for 1 min. Add the orange segments and the reserved marinade and heat through for 1 min.

title: Orange turkey stir-fry
